p: To confirm the unexpected observation that the IRES mediated higher levels of downstream ORF expression than the upstream cap-dependent ORF, we cloned nLUC in both orientations as H-EMCV opt-nLUC or nLUC-EMCV opt-H. Transcribed RNA was capped, transfected into BHK21 cells, and cell lysates were harvested 16Â h later for measurement of nLUC activity ( Figures S3A and S3B). Expression of nLUC downstream of the IRES in the second cistron was more efficient than cap-dependent expression from the first cistron at each of the doses tested.
